title: Rust: Memory Safety Without Garbage Collection
content: Rust was developed by Graydon Hoare in 2010 while working at Mozilla. Designed to eliminate memory-related bugs, Rust offers a unique approach to memory management without requiring garbage collection. This focus on safety and performance has made Rust a favorite among system programmers, game developers, and blockchain engineers. With its focus on security, Rust is shaping the future of software development.
